title: What time is the Barcelona final?
description: Carlos Alcaraz and Holger Rune are set to compete in the Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell final, which will take place Sunday at 4 p.m. CEST/10 a.m. ET. The Spaniard leads Rune 2-1 in their Lexus ATP Head2Head series, but their title tilt in Barcelona will mark a first meeting on clay. Alcaraz is eyeing his third Barcelona crown in four years, having won back-to-back titles in 2022-23. Rune, who rose four spots to No. 9 in the PIF ATP Live Rankings with his semi-final win, will compete in his first tour-level final on clay since the ATP Masters 1000 in Rome in 2023. He is aiming for his first trophy this season. Read more from Barcelona: Alcaraz sets Rune clash in blockbuster Barcelona final Alcaraz, Rune meet FC Barcelona players Watch Extended Highlights from Saturday's SF action: [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Carlos Alcaraz faces Holger Rune in Sunday's blockbuster final at the Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell. Find out more here.

html:
Barcelona

Two-time champion Alcaraz faces Rune in blockbuster clash

April 19, 2025

Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell – Trofeo Conde de Godó

The Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell final takes place Sunday at 4 p.m. CEST/10 a.m. ET. By ATP Staff

Carlos Alcaraz and Holger Rune are set to compete in the Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell final, which will take place Sunday at 4 p.m. CEST/10 a.m. ET.

The Spaniard leads Rune 2-1 in their Lexus ATP Head2Head series, but their title tilt in Barcelona will mark a first meeting on clay.

Alcaraz is eyeing his third Barcelona crown in four years, having won back-to-back titles in 2022-23. Rune, who rose four spots to No. 9 in the PIF ATP Live Rankings with his semi-final win, will compete in his first tour-level final on clay since the ATP Masters 1000 in Rome in 2023. He is aiming for his first trophy this season.

Read more from Barcelona:
Alcaraz sets Rune clash in blockbuster Barcelona final
Alcaraz, Rune meet FC Barcelona players
